description: This week, we focus on extracting data from the internet and cleansing that data as well as explore some techniques for integrating that data into designs.

activities.name: Extracting Information and Knowledge from Data
activities.description: As a group, take the provided dataset and dig into it. What did you learn about it? What tools did you use?
activities.instructor_notes: data -> info -> knowledge; Ideas for datasets: Olin Courses,

assignments.description: Craft a few sample datasets. Individually or with one other person, practice crafting a realistic dataset. The result should be a CSV file and a description of why that dataset is "realistic". This is a 2 week assignment
